amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to require a report on the current status of American uranium, how America's uranium compares to the global supply of uranium in terms of quantity and quality.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Donalds amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Donalds.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Donalds amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
